description: Implement a typed configuration loader that reads JSON config from disk and validates required fields

acceptance.architecture_check: Loader must be in src/config/ or src/utils/, export a named function

description: Add input validation to an API request handler, rejecting requests with missing or invalid fields

acceptance.architecture_check: Validator must be in src/validators/ or co-located with handler, no business logic

description: Implement an async task queue with configurable concurrency limit and retry logic on failure

acceptance.architecture_check: Queue must not depend on external services, pure in-memory implementation

description: Create a database repository with CRUD operations for a User entity using repository pattern

acceptance.architecture_check: Repository must implement an interface, injected as dependency in consumers

description: Build a middleware chain with error handling, supporting both sync and async middleware functions

acceptance.architecture_check: Chain must be framework-agnostic, error middleware must have distinct signature
